meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a phalanx.
meanings.sent1: The phalangeal formation of the soldiers made them a strong unit.
meanings.sent2: The phalangeal structure of the team ensured they worked together effectively.
meanings.sent3: The phalangeal coordination of the dancers was impressive to watch.
meanings.sent4: The phalangeal bond between the friends was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The phalangeal connection between the gears kept the machine running smoothly.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a phalanx or phalanges.
meanings.sent1: The phalangeal arrangement of the books on the shelf was neat.
meanings.sent2: She admired the phalangeal beauty of the intricate hand jewelry.
meanings.sent3: The phalangeal pattern of the flowers in the garden was pleasing to the eye.
meanings.sent4: The phalangeal design of the necklace caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The phalangeal alignment of the planets was a rare celestial event.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the bones of the fingers or toes.
meanings.sent1: He felt a sharp pain in his phalangeal bones after accidentally hitting his toe.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her phalangeal structure to check for any fractures.
meanings.sent3: The phalangeal injury from the basketball game left him limping for days.
meanings.sent4: She painted her phalangeal nails with a bright red polish.
meanings.sent5: The phalangeal flexibility of the gymnast allowed her to perform amazing stunts.
